<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3411</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Nobel Laureates: 1991- the Nobel Prize in Physiology or medicine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nobel Laureaten: 1991- der Nobelpreis in 
der Physiologie oder in der Medizin</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Lauréats Nobel : 1991- le prix Nobel dans 
la physiologie ou la médecine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Laureates De Nobel: 1991- o prêmio de 
nobel no physiology ou na medicina</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Laureates Nobel: 1991- il premio Nobel 
nella fisiologia o nella medicina</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δαφνοστεφές Νόμπελ: 1991- το βραβείο Νόμπελ 
στη φυσιολογία ή την ιατρική</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Laureados Nobel: 1991- el premio Nobel en 
fisiología o medicina</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Information on the research done by Erwin Neher, Bert Sakmann which won them the Nobel Prize for their discoveries concerning the function of single ion channels in cells.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">nervous system</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ion channels</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cells</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Nobel Prize</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Informationen über die Forschung, die von Erwin 
Neher, Bert Sakmann erfolgt ist, das sie der Nobelpreis für ihre 
Entdeckungen hinsichtlich sind der Funktion des einzelnen Ions gewann,
lenken in den Zellen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'information sur la recherche faite par Erwin 
Neher, Bert Sakmann qui les a gagnées le prix Nobel pour leurs 
découvertes au sujet de la fonction de l'ion simple creuse des 
rigoles en cellules.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A informação na pesquisa feita por Erwin Neher,
Bert Sakmann que os ganhou o prêmio de nobel para suas descobertas a 
respeito da função do único íon canaliza nas pilhas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le informazioni sulla ricerca fatta da Erwin 
Neher, Bert Sakmann che le ha vinte il premio Nobel per le loro 
scoperte riguardo alla funzione di singolo ione scavano canali in 
cellule.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πληροφορίες για την έρευνα που γίνεται από τον 
Erwin Neher, Bert Sakmann ωχηθχ τους κέρδισε το βραβείο 
Νόμπελ για τις ανακαλύψεις τους σχετικά με τη λειτουργία των 
ενιαίων ιονικών καναλιών στα κύτταρα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La información sobre la investigación hecha por
Erwin Neher, Bert Sakmann que las ganó el premio Nobel para sus 
descubrimientos referentes a la función de solo ión acanala en 
células.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">nervöses System</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ionenführungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zellen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nobelpreis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">système nerveux</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">canaux d'ion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">cellules</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Prix Nobel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sistema nervoso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">canaletas do íon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">pilhas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Prêmio De Nobel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sistema nervoso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">scanalature dello ione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">cellule</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Premio Nobel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">νευρικό σύστημα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ιονικά κανάλια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κύτταρα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βραβείο Νόμπελ</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">sistema nervioso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">canales del ion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Premio Nobel</string>
          </keyword>
